forum.name: guide
forum.description: the anyland guide with faq, frequently asked questions and their answers! help along, wiki style!

thread.title: locomotion

comments.text: if you want to move more smoothly when walk-laser teleporting, go to your me "..." settings and pick "smooth walk motion".
another option there is "smooth riding on things", which affects how you move when stepping on moving objects (like an elevator or floating ship).
when using the desktop version, motion is smooth by default (using wasd keys), though you can still use the context-laser by pressing "e". also see [-> desktop]

thread.latestCommentText: when using the desktop version, motion is smooth by default, though you can still use the context-laser by pressing ctrl+right mouse button.
